cascade.text: the other day i asked a manager at the #ferguson market if police had requested surveillance video. she said no.
RT @JustinGlawe: The other day I asked a manager at the #Ferguson Market if police had requested surveillance video. She said no.
@JustinGlawe Who are you to expect any type of answer in the first place?
@marymolina20 a person who makes his living asking questions, that's who.
@JustinGlawe @JesseLaGreca it wasn't the quik stop that got burned down?
.@jashsf @JesseLaGreca I've been in #Ferguson Market and it looks exactly like where the alleged robber was standing.
@JustinGlawe @JesseLaGreca thanks. Now we need a pic of what michael brown was wearing to refute the video.
“@JustinGlawe: The other day I asked a manager at the #Ferguson Market if police had requested surveillance video. She said no.” Welp
